Title: A rivet, a bullet, all shoot at imperialism, revisionism, and reactionary forces
Designer: Propaganda Group of the Revolutionary Committee of the Xiangtan Steel Plant (湘潭钢铁厂革命委员会宣传组)
Publisher: Hunan renmin chubanshe (湖南人民出版社)
Notes: The slogans in the back read "Grasp revolution, increase production, protect work, increase preparation".
